description.p: As an ash genasi, your parents are air and fire genasi. As fickle as wind and flame, your moods are volatile but swift to pass.

Ash genasi typically have ash-grey skin tones, red to grey eyes and hair ranging from coal black to ash white. Ash genasi voices might sound like the wind cause by a conflagration, and may be accompanied by a constant warm breeze.

Ability Score Increase.Your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Unending Breath.You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.
Darkvision.You have 60ft of Darkvision
Ashen Born.You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft. You are also adapted to hot climates.
Touch the Conflagration.You know the control flames cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level you can cast feather fall spell at 1st level once per long rest.
You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

sheet.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

description.p: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft. You are also adapted to hot climates.

sheet.description: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft. You are also adapted to hot climates.

description.p: Touch the Conflagration. You know the control flames cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level you can cast feather fall spell at 1st level once per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the control flames cantrip. (Constitution)
You know the control flames cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level you can cast feather fall spell at 1st level once per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As a dust genasi, your parents are air and earth genasi. Solid yet shifting, your mind is as unknowable as a desert's shifting sands.
Dust genasi typically have pale skin, hair and eyes; all in light earthen tones. Some always have dust falling from their bodies whilst others are accompanied by a stiff dry breeze.

Ability Score Increase.Your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Unending Breath.You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.
Born of Dust.You have resistance to force damage. You also don't suffer disadvantage on perception checks in strong winds.
Caress of Silt.You know the mage hand cantrip, the hand appearing as a gust of dust. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast dust devil at 1st level one per long rest.
You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

sheet.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

description.p: You have resistance to force damage. You also don't suffer disadvantage on perception checks in strong winds.

sheet.description: You have resistance to force damage. You also don't suffer disadvantage on perception checks in strong winds.

description.p: You know the mage hand cantrip, the hand appearing as a gust of dust. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast dust devil at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the mage hand cantrip, the hand appearing as a gust of dust. (Constitution)
You know the mage hand cantrip, the hand appearing as a gust of dust. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast dust devil at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As an ice genasi your parents are water and air genasi. Wandering like waves and wind, you have a curious and confident spirit.

Ice genasi are cold and clammy to the touch, an impression reinforced by pale or icy blue skin, hair and eyes. They smell of fresh snow and winter breeze, and some have voices like the cracking of ice.

Ability Score Increase.Your Strength score increases by 1.
Unending Breath.You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.
Born of Frost.You have resistance to cold damage. You are acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft.
Call of the Blizzard.You know the shape water cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Armor of Agathys at 1st level one per long rest.
You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

sheet.description: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you’re not incapacitated.

description.p: You have resistance to cold damage. You are acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft.

sheet.description: You have resistance to cold damage. You are acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000ft.

description.p: You know the Shape water cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Armor of Agathys at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the Shape water cantrip. (Constitution)
You know the Shape water cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Armor of Agathys at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As an Ooze genasi your parents are water and earth genasi. You have the harsh and hungry nature of the swamp. Your decision tend to be slow moving, but always have a sense of inevitable persistence
Ooze genasi have skin of earthen tones, usually green or brown. Smelling of swamp and with jet black eyes they can be unnerving.

Ability Score Increase.Your Strength score increases by 1.
Swamp Born.You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage. You automatically succeed against quicksand.
Amphibious.You can breathe both air and water
Walk of Oblivion.You know the Druidcraft cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Ray of Sickness at 1st level one per long rest.
You can breathe both air and water.

sheet.description: You can breathe both air and water.

description.p: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage. You automatically succeed against quicksand.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage. You automatically succeed against quicksand.

description.p: You know the Druidcraft cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Ray of Sickness at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the Druidcraft cantrip, the hand appearing as a gust of dust. (Constitution)
You know the Druidcraft cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Ray of Sickness at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As a steam genasi, your parents are fire and water genasi. You have a personality like the lapping of waves and the dancing of flames.
Steam genasi typically have pale skin, hair and eyes that range in colour from red to blue. Steam always seems to emanate from their bodies and moisture seems to collect on their skin.

Ability Score Increase.Your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Hold Breath.You can hold your breath for a number of hours = you Constitution modifier.
Fire resistance.You have resistance to fire damage
Vestige of Vapor.You know the Acid splash cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Fog Cloud at 1st level one per long rest.
You can hold your breath for {{constitution:modifier}} hours.

sheet.description: You can hold your breath for {{constitution:modifier}} hours.

description.p: You know the Acid Splash cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Fog Cloud at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the Acid Splash cantrip. (Constitution)
You know the Acid Splash cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Fog Cloud at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As a magma genasi, your parents are fire and earth genasi. You tend to avoid rash decisions, but are liable to explosions of hot and volatile anger.

Nearly all magma genasi are feverishly hot as if burning inside, an impression reinforced by the fissures in their basalt-black flesh, from which a dull red light glows. Magma genasi voices might sound like popping lava, and their eyes may flare when angered. Some are accompanied by the scent of brimstone.

Ability Score Increase.Your Intelligence score increases by 1.
Darkvision.You have 60ft of darkvision
Volcanic legacy.You have resistance to fire damage additionally volcanic or rough earth terrains are no longer considered difficult terrains. You are adapted to hot climates.
Summons of Obsidian.You know the Mold Earth cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Searing Smite at 1st level one per long rest.
You have resistance to fire damage additionally volcanic or rough earth terrains are no longer considered difficult terrains. You are adapted to hot climates.

sheet.description: You have resistance to fire damage additionally volcanic or rough earth terrains are no longer considered difficult terrains. You are adapted to hot climates.

description.p: You know the Mold Earth cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Searing Smite at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the Mold Earth cantrip. (Constitution)
You know the Mold Earth cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Searing Smite at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)

description.p: As a storm genasi, your lineage is a blend of multiple different genasi, including blended genasi such as ice or ash, and pure genasi such as fire. You have some inherited fluctuating passions and great raw power from diverse lineage.

The storm manifests differently from one individual to the next. Storm genasi come in a great variety of vibrant electric colors such as yellow or blue, and more toned down thunder cloud greys. Some storm genasi have little crackles of electricity all over them, some have voices like booming thunder.

Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma score increases by 1.
Storm Born.You have resistance to lightning and thunder damage. You do not suffer disadvantage on perception checks due to heavy precipitation.
Heart of the Storm.You know the Mold Earth cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Searing Smite at 1st level one per long rest.
You have resistance to lightning and thunder damage. You do not suffer disadvantage on perception checks due to heavy precipitation.

sheet.description: You have resistance to lightning and thunder damage. You do not suffer disadvantage on perception checks due to heavy precipitation.

description.p: You know the Shocking Grasp cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Thunderwave at 1st level one per long rest.

sheet.description: You know the Shocking Grasp cantrip. (Constitution)
You know the Shocking Grasp cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast Thunderwave at 1st level one per long rest. (Constitution)
